Comment: a hopeless game when looking at the grade difference but it is always good playing someone who is a grandmaster to learn that tiny bit extra!
an opening i don't usually play but one i decided to try
straight into the attack and the control of the centre
i defend. now imagine if both our queens and kings were the other way around- white would have had a checkmate:)
white wants to get those pawns out of its way
more control of the centre for white now!
i now want more control of the centre
but nothing great for white there
now that knight is a certain annoyance!
